fields.name: Country or region
fields.title: Country or region
fields.description: Country or region (ie for countries that have subnational Spectrum files, the region will correspond to those used in the Spectrum subnational files)

fields.name: Total Tests
fields.title: Total Tests
fields.description: The annual number of HIV tests performed at the national level among the population aged 15+ years of age. This number should be equal to the total number of tests administered as part of HIV Testing and Counseling (HTC) and during antenatal care (ANC), and for which the clients received the results.

fields.name: Total Positive Tests
fields.title: Total Positive Tests
fields.description: Out of the total annual number of tests, how many were found to be HIV positive. This number should be equal to the number of positive tests found during HTC (in non-pregnant population) and during ANC among pregnant women

fields.name: Total HTC Tests
fields.title: Total HTC Tests
fields.description: Total annual number of tests performed in the population aged 15+ years outside of ANC services, and for which clients received the results.

fields.name: Total Positive HTC Tests
fields.title: Total Positive HTC Tests
fields.description: Annual number of tests that were found to be positive for HIV outside of ANC services.

fields.name: Total ANC Tests
fields.title: Total ANC Tests
fields.description: Annual number of pregnant women tested for HIV (and that received their results) as part of ANC services

fields.name: Total Positive ANC Tests
fields.title: Total Positive ANC Tests
fields.description: Annual number of pregnant women found to be HIV positive during ANC services

title: Shiny90 HIV Testing
description: If data does not exist, please indicate so with the value "NA" and ignore any warning given by Excel.
